description: Start hike from Witchcraft Lake, choose any of 3 moderately steep second growth trails up to the old logging road.  Turn north and hike past Rafe's Trail (marked) and Gordies's Trail (marked) to Pele's Trail (unmarked).  Turn west and head up nicely forested trail to the open rocky ridge.  Follow the ridge southward to the summit of Mt Benson.  Spectacular views of the interior mountains of mid-island Vancouver Island.
directions: Trailhead starts at the Witchcraft Lake parking area.  Good signage to get you on your way.
title: Mt Benson - N Ridge Trail
